name: genomics-deepvariant
label: Google Genomics DeepVariant
description: Run DeepVariant on Google Cloud Platform using Genomics API and export the output VCF file to BigQuery

fasta.description: Input FASTA, it can be gz file.

dest_bq_dataset.description: The output VCF file will be exported into this BigQuery dataset

machine_type.description: Machine type where the base pipeline will be executed.

base_pipeline_disk_size.description: Machine type where the base pipeline will be executed.

regions.description: The list of regions allowed for VM allocation separated by comma. If set, the zones field must not be set. DeepVariant runner will be executed in these regions.

zones.description: The list of zones allowed for the DeepVariant runner to start machines separated by comma. These VMs will do the actual work. Wildcard suffixes are supported.

shards.description: Number of shards to use for the entire pipeline. The number of shards assigned to each worker is set by dividing --shards by the number of workers for each job.

make_examples_workers.description: Number of workers (machines) to use for running the make_examples job.

make_examples_cores_per_worker.description: Number of cores for each worker in make_examples.

make_examples_ram_per_worker_gb.description: RAM (in GB) to use for each worker in make_examples.

make_examples_disk_per_worker_gb.description: Disk (in GB) to use for each worker in make_examples.

call_variants_workers.description: Number of workers (machines) to use for running the call_variants job.

call_variants_cores_per_worker.description: Number of cores for each worker in call_variants.

call_variants_ram_per_worker_gb.description: RAM (in GB) to use for each worker in call_variants.

call_variants_disk_per_worker_gb.description: Disk (in GB) to use for each worker in call_variants.

postprocess_variants_cores.description: Number of cores to use for postprocess_variants.

postprocess_variants_ram_gb.description: RAM (in GB) to use for postprocess_variants.

postprocess_variants_disk_gb.description: Disk (in GB) to use for postprocess_variants.

preemptible.description: Use preemptible VMs for the pipeline.

max_preemptible_tries.description: Maximum number of times to try running each worker (within a job) with preemptible VMs. Regular VMs will be used (for the particular shards assigned to that worker) after this many preemptions.

chr_regions.description: Optional space-separated list of regions to process. Elements can be region literals (chr20:10-20) or Google Cloud Storage paths to BED/BEDPE files.

author: Flywheel <support@flywheel.io>
